function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on social lockdown as the only preventive measure for covid-19 control.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient prevention measures for viral transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of waste management in building and construction projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient deconstruction and demolition processes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper material recovery and reuse practices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within commercial buildings due to changes in job dynamics and procedures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding long-lasting consequences of the covid-19 pandemic on building specifications and design.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of government support for the construction sector during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases at building sites","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the post-covid-19 industry condition","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants impacted by an epidemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High percentage of participants directly involved in projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of business continuity measures for epidemic impacts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey data collected from multiple continents and countries, potentially increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases during data collection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in respondent locations and government directives, including legislation and it facilities for remote work, may contribute to differing levels of exposure and risk for contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close-ended and open-ended survey questions may lead to qualitative and quantitative data collection, potentially capturing complex and diverse perspectives on the impact of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific description of ’possible sample’ leading to sampling bias","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of easy random sampling without consideration of population characteristics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on the central limit theorem for sample sizes greater than 30","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of literature on the effects of covid-19 on construction firms","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited sample size in the research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of spss 25.0 for data analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emerging technology built by the transition of functions from biological systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Biomimetic transformation into a technical circumstance of the natural life cycle","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bio-mimicked products and methods need analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of hazardous materials in construction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient energy consumption in construction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management in construction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contraction of the german economy due to covid-19 impacts on the building industry and construction operations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruptions and slowdown of supplies and labor availability in the building industry due to covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluctuation of building operations in states and cities based on essential sector classification and covid-19 impacts.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overwhelm of information leading to entropy of the system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in credibility of personal opinions over scientific data","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overconfidence and misinformation among physicians","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Public trust in medical professionals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation regarding the use of anti-inflammatory drugs in relation to covid-19 treatment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evidence-based research on the recommended use of anti-inflammatory drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on expert opinions without sufficient scientific evidence","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of impacts of interventions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize health in economic, political, food, and built environment sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential compromise of data privacy and individual rights due to extensive tracing using big data and deployment of the police to enforce movement restriction measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequitable governance approaches leading to restricted access to safe spaces for physical activity and urban resources for certain communities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential discrimination and harm resulting from the application of lockdown measures in a discriminatory manner.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Centralized fresh food markets leading to movement restrictions and closure impacts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Flaws in urban infrastructure reducing resilience to food insecurity and promoting unsafe physical activity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in multisectoral responses to pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to nutritious foods for vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk-containment strategies at the community level","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
